short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that prefills the reservation form of the bouldering hall Het Lab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that prefills the reservation form of the bouldering hall Het Lab. This allows you to fill in your credentials once, after which you never have to enter them again.
